attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spore Ball
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Powdery Uppercut
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if this Pokémon used Spore Ball during your last turn.

abilities.name: Curative Bower
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon that have Grass Energy attached can't be Confused, and if they are already Confused, they recover from that Special Condition.

abilities.name: Sun-Drenched Shell
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Evopress
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your Evolution Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Matron's Anger
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Leaf Drain

attacks.name: Raid
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Burmy during this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Lively Fruit

attacks.name: Revenge Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: Star Bloom
abilities.text: During your turn, you may heal 120 damage from each of your Benched Grass Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

name: Acerola's Premonition
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you draw a card for each Trainer card you find there.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Barry
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Blunder Policy
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to uses an attack, if you flip any coins for the damage or effect of that attack, and if any of them are tails, draw 3 cards at the end of your turn.

name: Boss's Orders
rules: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Café Master
rules: Choose up to 3 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a different type of basic Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Cheren's Care
rules: Put 1 of your Colorless Pokémon that has any damage counters on it and all attached cards into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Choice Belt
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon V (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Cleansing Gloves
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Psychic Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Collapsed Stadium
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Cynthia's Ambition
rules: Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Fresh Water Set
rules: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Friends in Galar
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Gloria
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Hunting Gloves
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Dragon Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Kindler
rules: You can use this card only if you discard a Fire Energy card from your hand.Look at the top 7 cards of your deck and put up to 2 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Magma Basin
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may attach a Fire Energy card from their discard pile to 1 of their Benched Fire Pokémon. If a player attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Marnie's Pride
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pot Helmet
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to doesn't have a Rule Box, it takes 30 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Roseanne's Backup
rules: Choose 1 or more:• Shuffle a Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle a Pokémon Tool card from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle a Stadium card from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle an Energy card from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Yell's Cheer
rules: Shuffle up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon and Supporter cards, except for Team Yell's Cheer, from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Explosive Fire
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Star Blaze
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Trick Wind
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Pokémon Tool or Special Energy cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Fluffball Star
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

abilities.name: Starbirth
abilities.text: During your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Trinity Nova
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon V in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Cheren's Care
rules: Put 1 of your Colorless Pokémon that has any damage counters on it and all attached cards into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Cynthia's Ambition
rules: Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Kindler
rules: You can use this card only if you discard a Fire Energy card from your hand.Look at the top 7 cards of your deck and put up to 2 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Roseanne's Backup
rules: Choose 1 or more:• Shuffle a Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle a Pokémon Tool card from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle a Stadium card from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle an Energy card from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Reconstitute
abilities.text: You must discard 2 cards from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Psyray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Fighting Instinct
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless less for each of your opponent's Pokémon V in play.

attacks.name: Thunderous Kick
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Direflame Wings
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Direflame Wings Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Aura Burn
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Starbirth
abilities.text: During your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Trinity Nova
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon V in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Magma Basin
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may attach a Fire Energy card from their discard pile to 1 of their Benched Fire Pokémon. If a player attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
